product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Velocity Twin Air Mattress - Special Buy
long_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Velocity Twin Air Mattress is a great air bed whether you have out-of-town guests staying for the weekend or you're camping in the great outdoors. It is composed of a durable, completely PVC-free fabric that's very lightweight; coil system makes a solid and comfortable sleeping surface for a great night's sleep. Included state-of-the art pump comes with a wall charger and car charger so you can charge your pump wherever you are; pump inflates and deflates your air bed in just minutes. When it's time to leave, the pump quickly gets all of the air out so you can fold up the mattress and get it compactly back into the included stuff sack. The ALPS Mountaineering Velocity Twin Air Mattress easily fits in most camping tents; designed for indoor and outdoor use. Special buy.
short_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Velocity Twin Air Mattress is a great air bed whether you have out-of-town guests staying for the weekend or you're camping in the great outdoors.
